kb3.name: kb3_contracts
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_contracts` ( `ctr_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `ctr_name` char(128) NOT NULL, `ctr_site` char(64) NOT NULL, `ctr_campaign` int(6) NOT NULL default '0', `ctr_started` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `ctr_ended` datetime default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `ctr_comment` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ctr_id`), KEY `ctr_id` (`ctr_site`,`ctr_ended`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
